from __future__ import division import math
d = random.randrange(20000000000, 60000000000, 1000000) dkm = d/1000 v = random.randrange(40000, 60000, 1000) e = random.randrange(80, 95, 1) / 100
vfar = v*(1 - e)/(1 + e)
problem.p: A new comet is discovered. At its closest approach to the sun, it is $dkm kilometers away from the sun, and moving with a speed of $v m/s. Its orbit has eccentricity e = $e .
What is the speed of this comet (in m/s) at its greatest distance from the sun?
